[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/shops/inherit/bank_master.c

This is the bank's main branch inherit. Allows people to trade in credit notes for the money, or deposit credit notes.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Fri Jun 15 01:05:55 PDT 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/shops/inherit/bank_base.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/shops/bank.h and /include/money.h

Method index

do_process(object *)
Processes the specified credit objects to figure out if they need to deposit or withdraw money.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_process
int do_process(object * obs)
Processes the specified credit objects to figure out if they need to deposit or withdraw money.

Parameters:
obs - the objects to process
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
